comments.author: support@toremote.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/13.0.782.112 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

a textarea, position is absolute, set resize = none


Actual results:

double click on the text area, you'll be able to resize it


Expected results:

it shouldn't be resized.
comments.creator: support@toremote.com
comments.raw_text:

comments.text:
Created attachment 552376
test case

I just found. the bug can be reproduced only if there is a content editable canvas in the page.
